channel.title: Ummm i would like some help :mad:
channel.description: :mad: last night i just figured out how to portforward....so i was exited...i had some friends on my server...but i couldnt compile...so i asked my friend i and got a working compiler...but now when i click run server.bat it pops up for a sec then is gone...WTF?!??!

item.title: Ummm i would like some help :mad:
item.dc:creator: @pies pies
item.description:
@pies wrote:

Find Runserver.bat, right click and select edit. Then delete whats there and paste this:

@echo off
color 0a
title PiesScape
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

If that doesn’t work then I’m not sure what will, hope this helps

Read full topic
item.source: Ummm i would like some help :mad:
